text: The men's S5 50 metres freestyle competition of the swimming events at the 2015 Parapan American Games was held on August 12, 2015 at the Toronto Pan Am Sports Centre. ==Schedule== All times are Eastern Standard Time (UTC-5). {| class="wikitable" |- ! Date ! Time !
